column5: A New house in a beautiful community. Rental is 2nd floor. 1500+ sqft with open space high ceiling. 3 large furnished bedrooms and 2 full bathes + Living/game areas. Fast internet, TV... Major Highways: Immediate access to 3 major highways.  Convenience to Plano, Frisco, North Dallas, Addison, The Colony... Airports: Easily access to DFW and Love Field.  Restaurants & Shopping: Willow Bend Mall & Legacy shops, restaurants. Our place is good for business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Entire Floor 3BD/2BA in 2 Story Home or 1-2BD
